subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your application
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$244,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://tmgbood.com/
